thread.title: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: The Victors

post.author: Eugeny
post.body:
Unofficial addon for the game Return to Castle Wolfenstein.
Addon "Victors" starts creation in the years 2002-2003.
Approximate release date 2012.
You - a Soviet intelligence agent Nikolai Kuznetsov from the group. Your reconnaissance-sabotage group "winners" were abandoned on the territory temporarily occupied Soviet Ukraine for the destruction of Ukraine's Reich, Gauleiter of East Prussia, Erich Koch and others of Hitler's deputies ... However, you're out of luck - in the quest, you are caught by the Gestapo. So - the camera, interrogation, torture and possible execution of ... ... need to get out to their information and transmit obtained information!
trailers:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZsXMD_yNPhU
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tq-5Dz92Tqo

post.author: Eugeny
Eugeny
Eugeny
Gzegzolka
post.body: Looks interesting

post.author: jmarshall23
post.body: Is it just a story singleplayer mod or are you adding new game mechanics?

post.author: Eugeny
post.body:
jmarshall23 wrote:
Is it just a story singleplayer mod or are you adding new game mechanics?

This is a Single player mod, with the addition of weapons, features, hardly compatible with the original

post.author: jmarshall23
post.body:
If I may ask what new features, and what sets it apart from the original? I'm not trying to be a hard ass those screenshots look awesome, but a addon for an old game is a great idea but you need to include new game mechanics that make the game more fun; and promote every addition no matter how small it may be.

For example lets say you added a nail gun:

"Added a awesome new gun that shoots deadly nails at such a fast rate of speed your enemies don't know what happened to them as their bodies are being ripped to pieces".

post.author: Eugeny
post.body:
Added character a dog

Added 11 new weapons.
Removed 6 weapons

List of weapons
    knife, Luger, Walther, TT33, MP34, MP40, STG44, PPSH41, PPS43 (tentative), Kar98K, Kar98K (sniper), Mosin, FG42, G43, SVT40, Grenades (std. set) 17. Panzerfaust, MG34, flamethrower

14 levels playable and 4 cutscenes.

post.author: Eugeny
Eugeny
post.body: Added poison grenade

post.author: jmarshall23
post.body: A video would be nice : ).

post.author: Eugeny

post.body: Eugeny this indeed looks great!

post.author: Eugeny
post.body:
single level:
http://www.gamefront.com/files/4286914/Kicha
Run by original game.

post.author: hogsy
post.body: Pardon the bump but has there been anymore work on this lately? Certainly looks promising...
